Forwards Vakoun Bayo and Samuel Kalu are the latest additions to Watfords never-ending injury list ahead of tomorrows game at Cardiff.

articles.title: Malik Tillman left shattered as new Rangers demands made this week - Ibrox News
articles.description: Rangers playmaker Malik Tillman was left shattered after the 4-1 win over Aberdeen last time out after new demands were made, according to The Athletic.

articles.title: Graham Potter has Reece James solution as frustrated Chelsea duo leave him with no choice - Football.London

articles.content:
